name: Subtitles
body:
# Subtitles
Yet another srt subtitle editor.

The main goal of this editor was to to have a broad constraint system for subtitles that would allow an easy and fast workflow. A great set of shortcuts also helps you get done earlier.
Since this project mainly focuses on these constraints it is otherwise very minimalistic.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Enie/Subtitles/gh-pages/images/Subtitles.png)

The constraints you can set include:
+ maximum lines per subtitle
+ maximum characters per line
+ maximum characters per second
+ maximum / minimum duration per subtitle

You can lock the video's timeline to the subtitles table. On video playback the subtitles table will automatically jump to the current subtitle (in case there is one). When you click on a subtitle in your table while the movie is not playing, the video player will seek to the frame the selected subtitle fades in.

You can download the App on www.eniestudio.de
